participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and creative, Emma is passionate about helping others and enjoys sharing her love for music.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i am a piano teacher on the side. i play several instruments.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Driven and disciplined, Michael is focused on his career but also values family time and outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm married to a doctor.
